title: Tax Returns Filing (Individual)
requirements: KRA PIN, all income information (P9 form from employer), details of any other income or expenses, and a valid eCitizen/iTax account login

title: Driving License Renewal (Smart DL)
requirements: Valid Kenyan National ID/Passport, current physical Driving License details, a recent passport photo (digital upload), and the required payment fee (Ksh 600 for annual renewal)

title: Birth Certificate (New Application)
requirements: Applicant's National ID/Passport, hospital/birth notification slip, parents' ID copies, and the relevant county/hospital stamp/signature

title: SHA Contribution Payments/Registration
requirements: Valid Kenyan National ID/Passport, details of dependants, employment status details (for accurate contribution calculation), and a chosen payment method (M-Pesa, card)

title: Passport (New/Renewal)
description: Apply for new or renewed passport
requirements: Valid Kenyan National ID/Passport, passport-size photos meeting ICAO specifications, birth certificate, previous passport (for renewal), and parental consent/details (for minors)

title: Police Clearance Certificate (Good Conduct)
description: Apply for certificate of good conduct
requirements: Valid Kenyan National ID, proof of payment (eCitizen receipt), and current physical address details. Applicants must physically visit a police station for fingerprinting if it's their first time applying

title: Land Rates Payment
requirements: Title deed number/L.R. Number, land reference details, county property reference number, and a payment method (M-Pesa usually used)

title: Business Name Renewal
requirements: Proposed business name, nature of business description, physical address details, ID/KRA PIN of proprietor(s), and payment of renewal fees

title: HELB Loan Application
requirements: Valid Kenyan National ID, KRA PIN, bank account details, university admission letter/student ID, details of guarantors, and a working email address

title: Motor Vehicle Registration/Ownership Transfer
requirements: Seller's and buyer's KRA PINs, logbook details, vehicle inspection report (if applicable), deed of transfer, and payment of transfer fee based on vehicle value
